item.title: 沪教版上的欧亨利[0-50]
item.description:
沪教版上的欧亨利 http://wx3.sinaimg.cn/large/007fxYLnly1g4x7o9ni09j30u01b4drz.jpg
今天偶然看到的 就觉得哪里不对 原来是缩写版麦琪的礼物？ 刚好也是初中看的欧亨利 这个也太扯了 要说这篇你就不能直接说课后阅读读原文吗 原文也不长啊？而且这本书净是这种说有格调没多少格调的内容 很无聊 我觉得不如人教版简单直接 20年不看初中英语教材 看到这种觉得特别无稽
最扯淡我们一个北方县城用这种教材 然后中考又是人教版规格 不知道怎么想的
item.content:encoded:
fanghuan27:
沪教版上的欧亨利

今天偶然看到的 就觉得哪里不对 原来是缩写版麦琪的礼物？ 刚好也是初中看的欧亨利 这个也太扯了 要说这篇你就不能直接说课后阅读读原文吗 原文也不长啊？而且这本书净是这种说有格调没多少格调的内容 很无聊 我觉得不如人教版简单直接 20年不看初中英语教材 看到这种觉得特别无稽
最扯淡我们一个北方县城用这种教材 然后中考又是人教版规格 不知道怎么想的

maxwell_goblin:
初中生读麦琪礼物的原文吗
One dollar and eighty–seven cents. That was all. And sixty cents of it was in pennies. Pennies saved one and two at a time by bulldozing the grocer and the vegetable man and the butcher until one’s cheeks burned with the silent imputation of parsimony that such close dealing implied. Three times Della counted it. One dollar and eighty–seven cents. And the next day would be Christmas.
There was clearly nothing to do but flop down on the shabby little couch and howl. So Della did it. Which instigates the moral reflection that life is made up of sobs, sniffles, and smiles, with sniffles predominating.
和简写版不是一个概念
the Magi
ONE DOLLAR AND EIGHTY-SEVEN CENTS. That was all. She had put it aside, one cent and then another and then another, in her careful buying of meat and other food. Della counted it three times. One dollar and eighty-seven cents. And the next day
would be Christmas.
There was nothing to do but fall on the bed and cry. So Della did it.
